name: Marina Satti
description: '''Marina Satti''' ({{langx|el|Μαρίνα Σάττι}}; born 26 December 1986) is a Greek singer, composer, music producer and actress. Her music combines [[Greek traditional music|traditional Greek]], [[Arabic music|Arab]] and [[Balkan music|Balkan]] sounds with [[Urban music|urban]] elements, rhythm and production.
